fields.summary: Hyperloop: Android - Interfaces don't expose access to methods

comments.body:
[~emerriman], checked it again and this issue was resolved with TIMOB-24684. Calling {{lockCanvas}} on the {{SurfaceHolder}} no longer causes a crash.

Tested with the sample code from this ticket and the following environment:

SDK: 7.2.0.GA
Hyperloop: 3.0.5
OS: Mac OS 10.14
Appc CLI: 7.0.4
Node: 8.11.2
NPM: 6.0.1
Java: 1.8.0_152
Devices: AVD (Nexus 5X API Level 26), BQ Aquaris X (Android 7.1.1)
